## Notice

This project is a request for proposal (RFP) for relocation services for the Canadian Armed Forces Recruiting Center. Only pre-qualified suppliers will receive the tendering documents. However, as this tender has been cancelled, no further action is required. 

The procurement details and contracting entity information has been preserved for archival purposes. Please note that the contact information is subject to change. For future tenders and more information, kindly refer to the Public Works and Government
